item.description:
Hi everyone,

The votes are in, and it was close!  However, Friday won for us to get together. Panera's closes at 8pm, I will be there around 6:30pm, so start without me.  Just tell the manager you are there for the Newport Meet-up Group. He will have a place set up for us.

For the others, I'm sorry we'll miss you.  I will try to plan another date on a Saturday so that everyone gets a chance to "meet." 

Enjoy your Weekend - stay warm!

Tonia
item.name: Coffee & Relaxing Evening at Panera Bread
